value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I know where Njörðr has gone.
Let's make for his location.$k$pHow is Seiðr holding up, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|She's inconsolable... She just keeps
sobbing and repeating Heiðr's name...$k$pI don't know what to do for her...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$EFace|Do you think you could get through
to her, $Nu?$k$pShe told you about the future...
Maybe you can remind her of
the past.$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Attention, everyone! Enemy incoming!
Everyone to their posts!$k$pGullveig is here!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will...$k$pI will never be you! No matter what!$k$pIf it means Heiðr has to...has to...
I would rather—$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|I still remember when I said those
words myself. You would rather
die than let Heiðr suffer. I know.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...If you know, then—$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|You cannot die.$k$pThe serpent within you will not
permit it. Death is now beyond
your reach.$k$pI know because...it is likewise
beyond mine.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE15_11,0|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Our goal remains the same,
does it not, Seiðr?$k$pWe have to defeat Gullveig.
Anything we can do to give us
advantage should be our focus.$k$pLet's search for Njörðr. We need
to get whatever answers we can
out of him.$k$p$Sbs150|
